actions.name: New
actions.description: Creates a new file. If one exists, a file with a unique name will be created.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The filename (if not included, creates a unique filename).

parameters.name: path
parameters.description: The directory path (if not included, defaults to Documents).

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: The text to add to the file.

actions.name: Append
actions.description: Append text to a file, creating it if necessary.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The filename (if not included, creates a unique filename).

parameters.name: path
parameters.description: The directory path (if not included, defaults to Documents).

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: The text to add to the file.

actions.name: Replace
actions.description: Replaces the contents of a file, creating it if necessary.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The filename (if not included, creates a unique filename).

parameters.name: path
parameters.description: The directory path (if not included, defaults to Documents).

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: The text to add to the file.
